html:
2025-0592
2025-07-30FIN, GACCustoms TariffSteel Goods and Aluminum Goods Surtax OrderSteel Goods and Aluminum Goods Surtax Order in order to impose an additional surtax of 25 percent on steel that is melted and poured or aluminum that is smelted and cast in China, regardless of the country of export, except for the United States.Registration: SOR/2025-0154 Publication Date: 2025-08-13
subject: Steel Goods and Aluminum Goods Surtax Order
precis: Steel Goods and Aluminum Goods Surtax Order in order to impose an additional surtax of 25 percent on steel that is melted and poured or aluminum that is smelted and cast in China, regardless of the country of export, except for the United States.
